Module camstesting
Package enquiry

Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
enquiry.EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object
This class serves as an abstraction that handles the reading of data from enquiries.txt Database
Since:
24 nov 2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
group1

    • addEnquiry

      public void addEnquiry(String campName, Student student, String content, String reply)
      create the new enquiry and add it to the enquiry list
      Parameters:
      campName - name of the camp the enquiry is for
      student - the owner of the the enquiry
      content - the description of the enquiry
      reply - the reply of the enquiry

      Parameters:
      index - of the enquiry that got replied
      reply - the description of the reply
